short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SeaMeet: Transcription, notes, follow-ups, coherence, valuable insights.
short.zh_TW: SeaMeet提供Google Meet™會議轉錄與筆記整理，產生可持續跟進的待辦事項。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SeaMeet AI Meeting Copilot: Your 24/7 Companion for Real-Time Meeting Transcription, Summaries, and More

Seamless integration for Google Meet (online and hybrid meetings), support for uploaded audio, and features designed for cross-timezone collaboration, SeaMeet keeps you and your team in sync.

Key Use Cases:
1️⃣ Late or Double-Booked? Get instant access to missed discussions with real-time summaries, enabling you to catch up and join seamlessly.

2️⃣ Back-to-Back Meetings: Stay on top of each meeting's key points with immediate transcripts and summaries that keep you informed and in control.

3️⃣ Multiple Concurrent Meetings: Effortlessly manage overlapping sessions with SeaMeet’s real-time speech-to-text and summary capabilities.

4️⃣ Audience Mode: Need to stay informed but don’t need to speak? Use Audience Mode to stay updated without active participation.

5️⃣ Cross-Timezone Teams: Ensure all global team members stay aligned with shared summaries, available anytime, anywhere.

Key Features:
1. Real-Time Transcription 🎙
Highly accurate transcriptions for Google Meet.
Focus fully on discussions while SeaMeet captures every detail.

2. Intelligent Summaries and Action Items 🤖
AI-generated summaries with actionable items and topics, saving tons of time every meeting.

3. Centralized Meeting Notes Repository 🗂
Organize all meeting notes in one place. Search, review, and quickly find past discussions.

4. Seamless Sharing and Exporting 🔄
Instantly share meeting notes via email or Google Docs. Searchable, sharable, and trackable.

5. Integrated Notepad and Highlights 📝
Jot down agendas, notes, or action items directly during meetings. Timestamp crucial moments for easy reference.

6. Advanced Recording and Playback 📹
Record high-quality audio for playback of the full or specific parts of conversations.

7. Multilingual Transcriptions 🌐
Transcribes multiple languages, making meetings accessible across different dialects and languages.


🤝 Customer Success Story:
See how SeaMeet empowered a global team with members in Taiwan and Silicon Valley to boost productivity, saving 65 minutes per person weekly. With SeaMeet, they bridged timezone gaps, fostered intercultural communication, and gained insights into cross-border team dynamics.
>>> Read the entire report: https://usecase.seasalt.ai/seameet-global-team-case-study

💵 Plans and Pricing:
- Free Plan: 6 transcription hours (lifetime), 1 concurrent meeting, 5-hour meeting recording
- Individual ($9.99/month): 20 transcription hours, 100 audio uploads, export options
- Team ($14.99/month per user): 30 hours per user, 3 concurrent meetings, 200 uploads
- Enterprise: Custom options for advanced needs, including single sign-on, tailored meeting quotas, and dedicated technical support.

🔒 Data Privacy and Security
SeaMeet prioritizes your privacy, adhering to strict international standards for a secure meeting environment.
Support: seameet@seasalt.ai

Follow Us:
 - SeaMeet by Seasalt.ai: https://meet.seasalt.ai/
 - Seasalt.ai Official Website: https://seasalt.ai/
 - Twitter: https://twitter.com/SeasaltAI
 - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/seasalt-ai/
 - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@seasaltai
long.zh_TW:
SeaMeet，不再分身乏術

SeaMeet AI會議Copilot，專為今天快節奏的工作環境而設計。告別整理會議筆記的煩惱，不再分身乏術，即使在多個平行會議或遲到的情況下也能保持同步，完美表現，適合日理萬機的開發團隊/業務經理/HR經理/專案經理/CEO。

✅ SeaMeet支持線上會議、混合會議（實體＋線上）、音檔上傳。

🚀 使用場景:
1️⃣ 會議遲到： 不用擔心！通過即時摘要獲取您錯過的討論更新，直接加入討論。
2️⃣ 連續會議： 通過即時逐字稿和摘要隨時掌握各團隊進度，SeaMeet已經幫你抓出重點。
3️⃣ 平行會議： 即時語音轉文字（STT）和摘要功能給你分身術，多重會議沒問題。
4️⃣ 首創會議聽眾模式：只需要了解會議進度，但不需要參與會議討論？體驗首創聽眾模式
5️⃣ 跨時區團隊? 我總要睡覺吧?  共享會議摘要確保全球團隊保持更新，always on 24/7。


功能：實時生成Google Meet 多語言會議記錄、逐字稿(會議轉錄)、總結、分析、錄音、主題、摘要、待辦事項等


主要功能：

1. 動態實時轉錄 🎙：
   - 享受在Google Meet上實時轉錄的多國語言逐字稿。

2. 智能AI生成摘要 🤖：
   - 利用ChatGPT等AI技術實時提取討論的重點和行動項目。
   - 通過自動生成的簡潔摘要節省寶貴的會後時間，以便分發。

3. 行動項目和主題識別 📋：
   - 在會議期間或會議後輕松識別、分配和跟踪待辦事項，確保責任和後續跟進。
   - 揭示主要討論的主題，以便快速回顧或為那些錯過會議的人提供資訊。

4. 集中的會議筆記庫 🗂：
   - 訪問集中存放所有會議筆記的存儲庫，使回顧過去的討論變得輕而易舉。
   - 快速搜索您的會議歷史，以便在需要時快速找到資訊。

5. 無縫共享和導出 🔄：
   - 通過Google Doc輕松地在團隊間共享和編輯您的會議筆記。
   - 每個會議筆記都存放在單獨的Google Doc中。可搜索。可共享。可追溯。

6. 互動筆記本和重點標示 📝：
   - 使用集成的筆記本記錄議程、附加筆記或行動項目。
   - 在會議期間為重要時刻添加時間戳和高亮顯示，以便輕松參考。

7. **高級錄音功能 📹**：
   - 以高質量音頻錄製會議。
   - 回放功能。您可以聆聽整個對話或只是對話的一部分。

8. 多語言支持和議程安排 🌐：
   - 通過支持多種語言來滿足多元化的團隊需求。
   - 安排會議或活動，並讓SeaMeet自動加入已安排的會議，保持您的組織有序。

💡 成功案例
SeaMeet幫助位於台灣和矽谷的全球團隊提升生產力，每週平均節省65分鐘。突破時區限制，確保跨文化團隊持續溝通順暢，並為管理層提供清晰的團隊動態洞察。
>> 案例故事：https://usecase.seasalt.ai/seameet-global-team-case-study-zh
